abstract: Germans rept U-boat sunk Orion class Brit cruiser; 1 U-boat reptd to have sunk 23,000 tons of merchant shipping; Lt Comdr G Prien adds to shipping sunk by his U-boat
snippet: Germans rept U-boat sunk Orion class Brit cruiser; 1 U-boat reptd to have sunk 23,000 tons of merchant shipping; Lt Comdr G Prien adds to shipping sunk by his U-boat...

headline.main: NAZIS CLAIM U-BOAT TORPEDOED A CRUISER; Report Sinking of Orion Class Vessel South of Brest
